arcane.Toggle.android:title: Days On Kik
arcane.Toggle.android:summary: allows you to view how many days other users have been on kik

arcane.Toggle.android:title: Enable Bios
arcane.Toggle.android:summary: enables editing your bio and viewing other user bios

arcane.Toggle.android:title: Trophy Case
arcane.Toggle.android:summary: enables trophy case at top of settings
